metadata.name: Soulda #2570-CD
metadata.description: owner of the undefined project, on its official website terms licenses the undefined NFT holders have a full commercial use and derivative license for their own NFTs and creative works on NFTs. From a legal perspective, the undefined NFT holder has an exclusive license and trade NFT is equivalent to reselling that "exclusive license". The license allows the holder the right to make commercial use and derivatives.The "NFT-CD" license card released by undefined NFT holders at IP3 is an "non-exclusive" license based on the undefined NFT that allows Holders of the "NFT-CD" license card NFT have the same commercial use and derivative allowed license as undefined NFT holders, but with restrictions, including reproduction(1 copy only), display, adaptation(1 time only), and an agreed The holder can only exercise the corresponding rights during the period of validity.
